Name: Grand-cafe Patisserie Piri Reis
Review Text: I had a really nice lunch here. Good sandwich, coffee and delicious soup for the same price as the trendy coffee soup on the corner. They have wifi and the seats are wonderfully comfortable.

Name: Grand-cafe Patisserie Piri Reis
Review Text: March 2018, reopened. Nice owners, great all you can eat brunch. Omlettes, veggies, bread, soup, tea,.... â€¦

Name: Grand-cafe Patisserie Piri Reis
Review Text: A perfect place to start the day in. It's a family business and you'll feel that right away with their welcoming and the nice atmosphere. It does get the morning sun, for a coffee in the terrace.

Name: Grand-cafe Patisserie Piri Reis
Review Text:
I visited with my lovely family today.We had very tasty food,especialy kulbasti,highly recomend it.
Thank you for your good service and foods,I am sure We will come back again
